Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.sentence: The nurse raises the opposite side of the bed to access the bed sheet easily.
Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.subject: The nurse
Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.object: the opposite side of the bed

Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.sentence: The nurse carefully tucks the opposite side bed sheet into the mattress to prevent it from dragging on the floor.
Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.subject: The nurse

Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.sentence: The nurse grasps the corner of the opposite side bed sheet to pull it away from the mattress.
Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.subject: The nurse
Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.object: the corner of the opposite side bed sheet

Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.sentence: The nurse pulls the opposite side bed sheet gently towards herself to remove it from the bed.
Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.subject: The nurse

Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.sentence: The nurse discards the removed opposite side bed sheet into the designated laundry bin.
Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.subject: The nurse
Withdraw the opposite side bed sheet.object: the removed opposite side bed sheet
